mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.store_id AS "storeId", a.store_name AS "storeName", a.store_phone AS "storePhone", a.white AS "white", a.province_code AS "provinceCode", a.city_code AS "cityCode", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.address AS "address", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basic_store( id, org_id, store_id, store_name, store_phone, white, province_code, city_code, area_code, address, create_date, create_by, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgId}, #{storeId}, #{storeName}, #{storePhone}, #{white}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{areaCode}, #{address}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE basic_store SET org_id = #{orgId}, store_id = #{storeId}, store_name = #{storeName}, store_phone = #{storePhone}, white = #{white}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, city_code = #{cityCode}, area_code = #{areaCode}, address = #{address}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT (bss.store_id) FROM basic_service_store bss LEFT JOIN basic_service_station bsst ON bsst.id= bss.station_id WHERE bsst.org_id=#{orgId} and bsst.del_flag=0
